main event: A UFO sighting involving a yellow or orange object was reported circling the Buffalo, New York area.
interesting points: The sighting lasted for about 2 minutes., The object was described as flashing and circling the area., The observation was made from a civilian source., Sparks were reported coming out of the rear end of the object., There is insufficient data to conclude if it was an astro-physical or technical phenomenon.
witness description: Mrs. Buff, age 51, in Buffalo, NY.
